name: Endless Knight (itch) (P B K, Gridbear7)
description:
What does it take to get some peace on top of a hellish blood mountain, where so-called heroes can return to life over and over?

It takes a lot of smashing.

Entry for the Technically a Jam 2022, with the theme of 'Like X but Y;' In this case, like a popular sort of 'keep trying till you kill it' action games, but with you as the poor boss. It was made over a week by:

ASN/PinballKitty - Animation, Writing, Level design, Programming

Matteo Buda - 3d modeling, Texturing, Rigging

John Willow - Music and SFX (Soundcloud)

Daniel Wells/Hammy - Shaders & Programming

15.ai - ML voice generation

Version 1.0 fixes various bugs and adds windowed support.
